metadata.title: Trust Vault — Secure Data Storage and Transfer
metadata.description: Create reliable encrypted containers, distribute access with ease, and securely transfer data without risk. Open-source solution with modern encryption algorithms.

about.title: About the product
about.text: Trust Vault is your personal data safe, designed with security, privacy, and convenience in mind. We’ve combined cutting-edge encryption technologies with a flexible approach to access management, so you can store and share data without fear of leaks.

for.title: Who We Built This For?
for.3: Families who want to share important documents
for.4: Anyone tired of trusting their data to cloud giants

single.title: SINGLE
single.text: Perfect for personal use or small teams. Secure your data fully — no sign-ups, no subscriptions, no limits.

enterprise.title: ENTERPRISE (SOON)
enterprise.text: Full control and compliance. Deploy on your own infrastructure, integrate seamlessly with corporate systems, and adhere to top security standards.

cloud.title: CLOUD
cloud.text: Get started instantly — no server setup required. Access and manage your secure containers from any device, anywhere.

text.1: Your personal vault, right on your computer.
text.2: The single version is a completely standalone app for secure local storage. No sign-ups, no servers, no internet required — total control is yours.

plans.title: Plans
plans.text: Our journey is clear and deliberate: starting with a simple, secure local vault, and evolving into a comprehensive platform for sharing, team collaboration, and enterprise-grade integrations.

1.title: Сore + CLI
1.text: Functions for encryption, container generation, and management. Local operation without a GUI, offering maximum transparency. Perfect for DevOps, automation, and CI/CD workflows.

2.title: Single (Beta)
2.text: No sign-ups, no internet required, and complete control stays with you. User-friendly graphical interface built on the core.

3.title: Cloud
3.text: Sync your containers via an encrypted cloud. Access them on multiple devices with zero security compromises.

4.title: Enterprise
4.text: Multi-user access, permissions, auditing, and integrations — all the essentials for enterprise-scale deployment.
